product_name: CamelBak Marathoner Hydration Vest - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: With its quick access to cargo, the lightweight, hands-free CamelBak Marathoner Hydration Vest with 70 fl. oz. reservoir is ideal for marathon training and trail running. Adjustable dual sternum straps and shoulder harness ensures a snug, stable fit. 70 fl. oz. (2L) Antidote(TM) lumbar reservoir is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Reservoir is housed in the lumbar portion of the pack to keep the water weight off your shoulders. Big Bite(TM) valve is easy to use-just bite and sip. Quick stash overflow storage; enough room for an extra layer and nutrition. The CamelBak Marathoner Hydration Vest offers plenty of pocket space for cargo.
short_description: With its quick access to cargo, the lightweight, hands-free CamelBak Marathoner Hydration Vest with 70 fl. oz. reservoir is ideal for marathon training and trail running.
